EmailTemplate.subject: Compliance Week Europe 2016 - You're invited!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Greetings {!Contact.FirstName},
I was unable to reach you by phone today but did leave a voicemail message. I wanted to extend a personal invitation for you or a colleague, to join us at the upcoming Compliance Week Europe conference, 7-8 November 2016 . Please, see your pre-approved discount code below.
Further discounts may be available if you care to contact me.
This year there is also a new certification workshop on 9 November, for which Attendees are eligible to receive 14 CPD credits.
As in past years, it will be held at the Crowne Plaza in Brussels, and the speaker line-up and agenda is shaping up nicely.
A sample of key sessions are: • Identifying fraud in your organisation • ISO 19600 and compliance audits • CCO accountability • Conducting internal investigations • Defining & managing conflicts of interest • Intersection of CSR and compliance • Supply chain risk
WORKSHOP (9 November)
This year you will have the opportunity to register for a half-day workshop on 9 November to complete either the ICA Specialist Certificate in Corporate Governance or the ICA Specialist Certificate in Managing Sanctions Risk
Please see below for a link to register.
Register Now, and use the discount code CWEBROAD for €200 off individual registration.
Please feel free to contact me with any questions.
Best regards,
Maggie Stokes maggie.stokes@complianceweek.com Tel. +44 (0)1822 813054 Wilmington Compliance Week Inc. A division of WILMINGTON PLC
